items.name: Browse all types
items.description: Returns a list of all available types, as a array of responses

request.description: The last type id sent in the list

items.description: A list of fields returned in the response

items.description: The type id

items.description: The type description

items.description: The date the type was created

items.name: created_by

items.name: modified_at
items.description: The date the type was modified

items.name: modified_by
items.description: The username who modified the type

errors.name: Unauthenticated request
errors.description: The client has not authenticated himself

errors.name: Request is invalid
errors.description: There is some error with the request message
